mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select t1.deliver_id,t1.deliver_code,t1.express_code,t1.express_date,t1.consignee_user_id,t1.consignee_date,t1.consignee_status, t2.order_code, t3.dealer_name from dms.tb_deliver t1 inner join dms.tb_order t2 on t1.order_id = t2.id inner join dms.tb_dealer t3 on t1.dealer_id = t3.dealer_id where t1.consignee_status is not null ) t

select * from ( select t1.deliver_id,t1.deliver_code,t1.express_code,t1.express_date,t1.consignee_user_id,t1.consignee_date,t1.consignee_status, t2.order_code, t3.dealer_name from dms.tb_deliver t1 inner join dms.tb_order t2 on t1.order_id = t2.id inner join dms.tb_dealer t3 on t1.dealer_id = t3.dealer_id where t1.consignee_status is not null )t
limit #{offset},#{pagesize}
select LPAD(max(deliver_no)+1,3,0) as deliver_no from dms.tb_deliver WHERE create_date between CURDATE() AND CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59')
mapper.insert: update dms.tb_deliver set remark = #{remark} where deliver_id =#{deliver_id}
mapper.update: update dms.tb_deliver set express_code = #{express_code} where deliver_code =#{deliver_code}
